result.title: Codeforces -- 1 -- Theatre Square
result.content:
Your code here...

/* author:Susake */

include <stdio.h>

include <stdlib.h>

include <string.h>

define N 36000

void Susake_mul(char *s1, char *s2) { int len1 = strlen(s1), len2 = strlen(s2), len, i, j, k = 0, tip = 0, tag = 0; int a[N] = {0}, b[N] = {0}, c[N] = {0}; for(i = 0; i < len1; a[i] = s1[len1 — 1 — i++] — '0') ; for(i = 0; i < len2; b[i] = s2[len2 — 1 — i++] — '0') ; for(i = 0; i < len1; i++) { for(j = 0; j < len2; j++) { if(a[i] * b[j] >= 10) { c[k] += a[i] * b[j] % 10; if(c[k] >= 10) { c[k] = c[k] % 10; c[k + 1]++; } c[k + 1] += a[i] * b[j] / 10; if(c[k + 1] >= 10) { c[k + 1] = c[k + 1] % 10; c[k + 2]++; } } else { c[k] += a[i] * b[j]; if(c[k] >= 10) { c[k] = c[k] % 10; c[k + 1]++; if(c[k + 1] >= 10) { c[k + 1] = c[k + 1] % 10; c[k + 2]++; } } } k++; tag = k; } tip++; k = tip; } if(c[tag]) printf("%d", c[tag]); for(i = tag — 1; i >= 0; i--) printf("%d", c[i]); }

int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { char s1[N], s2[N]; __int64 n, m, a, count1, count2; scanf("%I64d%I64d%I64d", &n, &m, &a); count1 = n / a >= 1 ? n % a ? n / a + 1 : n / a : 1; count2 = m / a >= 1 ? m % a ? m / a + 1 : m / a : 1 itoa(count1, s1, 10); itoa(count2, s2, 10); Susake_mul(s1, s2); puts(""); return 0; }
